title: Political Gabfest Extra: Windy City Wander
description:
David Plotz and Emily Bazelon recently took a spin through downtown Chicago. Hear their conversation about Chicago's history, its national profile, and a sea change in the city's mighty river.

itunes:subtitle: Two Gabfesters visit Chicago and make a beeline for the river.
